exercises.name: Treadmill
instruction: Step onto the treadmill and attach the safety clip.
Set the desired speed and incline.
Walk or jog with an upright posture, swinging your arms naturally.
Maintain steady breathing and avoid leaning on the handles.
exercises.description: Improves cardiovascular endurance, burns calories, and strengthens lower body muscles while enhancing stamina.

exercises.name: Arm circles back
instruction: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Extend arms straight out at shoulder height.
Rotate arms backward in small circles.
Gradually make the circles larger while maintaining control.
exercises.description: Enhances shoulder flexibility, warms up joints, and improves mobility.

exercises.name: Arm circles forward
instruction: Stand upright with feet shoulder-width apart.
Extend arms straight out at shoulder height.
Rotate arms forward in small circles.
Gradually increase the size of the circles.
exercises.description: Increases blood flow to the shoulders, improves joint mobility, and prepares the upper body for workouts.

exercises.name: Hanging side leg raise
instruction: Hang from a pull-up bar with arms fully extended.
Keep your core tight and legs straight.
Lift legs out to the side until they reach hip height.
Lower them back slowly without swinging.
exercises.description: Strengthens obliques, core stability, and improves grip strength.

exercises.name: Seated pec fly
instruction: Sit on the pec fly machine with your back against the pad.
Grasp the handles with elbows slightly bent.
Bring the handles together in front of your chest.
Slowly return to the starting position.
exercises.description: Targets chest muscles, improves posture, and strengthens pushing movements.

exercises.name: Flat bench dumbbell chest press
instruction: Lie flat on a bench holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Position dumbbells at chest level with palms facing forward.
Press the dumbbells upward until arms are fully extended.
Lower slowly to the starting position.
exercises.description: Builds chest strength, improves arm power, and engages triceps.

exercises.name: Machine incline chest press
instruction: Sit on the incline press machine with back supported.
Grip the handles with palms facing forward.
Push the handles upward and forward until arms are extended.
Slowly return to the starting position.
exercises.description: Focuses on the upper chest muscles for a fuller chest appearance.

exercises.name: Chest to floor push-ups
instruction: Start in a plank position with hands under shoulders.
Lower your body until your chest touches the floor.
Push back up to the starting position.
Keep core tight and body straight throughout.
exercises.description: Strengthens chest, shoulders, and triceps while improving core stability.

exercises.name: High-pulley curl
instruction: Stand facing the high pulley machine.
Hold the bar with an underhand grip.
Curl the bar toward your forehead while keeping elbows stationary.
Lower slowly to starting position.
exercises.description: Isolates biceps for muscle growth and definition.

exercises.name: Elliptical trainer
instruction: Step onto the pedals and hold the handles.
Begin pedaling in a forward motion.
Push and pull the handles for an upper-body workout.
Maintain a steady pace and posture.
exercises.description: Low-impact cardio that improves endurance and burns calories while engaging both upper and lower body.

exercises.name: Chest muscles stretch
instruction: Stand beside a wall or doorway.
Place your forearm against the surface with elbow at shoulder height.
Gently turn your body away to feel a stretch in the chest.
Hold for the prescribed time.
exercises.description: Improves chest flexibility, aids recovery, and helps maintain posture.

exercises.name: Hand and shoulder extensor stretch
instruction: Extend one arm straight in front of you, palm down.
Use the other hand to gently pull fingers back toward you.
Feel the stretch in your forearm and shoulder.
Hold for the prescribed time.
exercises.description: Enhances flexibility in forearms and shoulders, reducing injury risk.

new_exercises.name: Barbell curl
instruction: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell with an underhand grip.
Keep elbows tucked to your sides.
Curl the barbell upward toward your shoulders.
Lower slowly back to the starting position.
new_exercises.description: Classic biceps mass builder that develops arm strength and definition.

new_exercises.name: Overhead triceps extension
instruction: Hold a dumbbell with both hands and lift it overhead.
Keep elbows close to your ears.
Lower the dumbbell behind your head in a controlled motion.
Extend your arms back up to the starting position.
new_exercises.description: Strengthens the triceps and improves overhead pushing power.

new_exercises.name: Plank hold
instruction: Start in a forearm plank position with elbows under shoulders.
Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Engage your core and avoid sagging hips.
Hold for the prescribed time.
new_exercises.description: Builds core stability, endurance, and improves posture.
